Description: The following statement contains a magic number: foreach (XmlNode xn in xd.SelectNodes("/items/item"))              {                  name = xn.Attributes[1].Value;                  yield return new City                  {                      ID = int.Parse(xn.Attributes[0].Value)'                      Pid = int.Parse(xn.Attributes[2].Value)'                      Name = name'                      Zip = xn.Attributes[3].Value'                      Text = xn.InnerText.Trim() == "" ? name : xn.InnerText.Trim()                  };              }
